title: ***[MAC-7] Featured: Configurable Static Image can be set for when there is no Featured Game available (Offseason)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has installed and launched the MLB.TV Mac app
AND the user has navigated to the Featured Game view
AND the user has not designated a Favorite Team
AND there is no Featured Game for the day
AND it is the Offseason
AND a developer has configured an image
custom_steps: WHEN the user goes to the Featured Game Landing Page
custom_expected: THEN the image set in the config will display

title: Featured: Verify the Featured Game view is the default view when the app is accessed when there is no Favorite Team set
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has installed the MLB.TV Mac app
AND the user has no Favorite Team set
AND there are still games left in the season
custom_steps: WHEN the app is accessed
custom_expected: THEN the default view will be the Featured Game View

title: Featured: Verify the Featured Game that displays is designated by the first game on the scoreboard
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has installed and launched the MLB.TV Mac app
AND the user has navigated to the Featured Game view
custom_steps:
WHEN the user views the Featured Game
AND the user navigates to the Scoreboard EPG
custom_expected: THEN the game that displays in the Featured Game view will reflect the first game listed on the Scoreboard EPG

title: Featured: Verify when a game moves to Final that the Featured Game changes to the next game on the scoreboard
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has installed and launched the MLB.TV Mac app
AND the user has navigated to the Featured Game view
AND the first game listed on the Scoreboard is about to move to Final
AND there are more games still playing that day
custom_steps:
WHEN the first/Featured game moves to Final
AND it moves to the bottom of the Scoreboard
custom_expected: THEN the Featured Game will update to display the next game on the scoreboard that's now listed at the top

title: Featured: Verify a login bar will appear appear above the Featured Game screen when the user is not logged in
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has installed and launched the MLB.TV Mac app
AND the user is currently not logged into an MLB.TV account
custom_steps: WHEN the user is on the Featured Game screen
custom_expected:
THEN above the game information will display an option to login
> Already an MLB.TV subscriber? | Log In

AND pressing the Log In option will launch the Login Popup Window

title: Featured: Favorite Team will have a star next to it's name
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has installed and launched the MLB.TV Mac app
AND the user has set at least one team as their Favorite Team
AND one of the user's Favorite Team's is the Featured Game
custom_steps: WHEN the user has navigates to the Featured Game view
custom_expected: THEN there will be a star in the top left corner indicating that the game involves the user's Favorite Team

title: Featured: Verify a game in the Preview state displays properly on the Featured Game view
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has installed and launched the MLB.TV Mac app
AND the user has navigated to the Featured Game view
AND the game is in the Preview state
custom_steps: WHEN we look at the Featured Game view
custom_expected:
THEN we will see that the team logos are visible
AND that the game start time is visible
AND that the Probable Pitchers are visible
AND the Away Team's Logo will display on the left
AND the Home Team's Logo will display on the right
AND the Away Team's Probable Pitcher will be listed on the top
AND the Home Team's Probable Pitcher will be listed on the bottom
AND the Probable Pitchers' stats are correct

title: Featured: Verify a game In Progress displays properly on the Featured Game view
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has installed and launched the MLB.TV Mac app
AND the user has navigated to the Featured Game view
AND the game is Live and In Progress
custom_steps: WHEN we look at the Featured Game view
custom_expected:
THEN we will see that the team logos are visible
AND the Away Team's Logo will display on the left
AND the Home Team's Logo will display on the right
AND the game displayed is showing the correct score
AND we will see the correct <inningState><inningNumber> being displayed
AND the game displayed is showing the correct base runner indicator below the score
AND the game displayed is shwoing the correct BSO count indicator next to the base runner indicator

title: Featured: Verify a game in the Final state displays properly on the Featured Game view
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has installed and launched the MLB.TV Mac app
AND the user has navigated to the Featured Game view
AND the game is in the Final state
custom_steps: WHEN we look at the Featured Game view
custom_expected:
THEN we will see that the team logos are visible
AND the Away Team's Logo will display on the left
AND the Home Team's Logo will display on the right
AND the game displayed is showing the correct score
AND the Final state is displayed
AND the pitching information will appear immediately below the final score information
AND the pitching information will be in the format of:
>W: <pitchername> (W-L, ERA) 
>L: <pitchername> (W-L, ERA) 
>S: <pitchername> (<saves>)

title: Featured: Verify the Featured Game view updates as a Live game progresses
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has installed and launched the MLB.TV Mac app
AND the user has navigated to the Featured Game view
AND the visible game is currently in progress
custom_steps: WHEN the game progresses
custom_expected:
THEN the score will update accordingly
AND active baserunner indicator will update accordingly
AND the score will update accordingly
AND the BSO pitch indicator will update accordingly

title: Featured (Game States): Verify that when a game is in the state of "Game Over" that it's displayed as "Final"
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has installed and launched the MLB.TV Mac app
AND the user has navigated to the Featured Game view
AND the Featured Game is in the Game Over state
custom_steps: WHEN we look at the Featured Game view
custom_expected:
THEN the game cell will NOT reflect the inning state anywhere
AND the game cell will reflect instead the words Final
AND the Base Runner Indicator will no longer be visible in the game cell
AND the team logos will be correct
AND the team scores will be correct
AND the pitcher information will be correct

title: Featured (Game States): Verify that a resumption of a suspended game with no probable pitchers reflects properly on the Scoreboard
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has installed and launched the MLB.TV Mac app
AND the user has navigated to the Featured Game view
AND the game is a resumption of a suspended game
AND there are no probable pitchers set for the game.
custom_steps: WHEN we look at the game in question
custom_expected:
THEN the Featured Game view will show the game time
AND shows 'Susp' beneath the game time
AND the score will be shown on the view
AND there will not be innings shown
AND below the game will display 'Game is resumed from <M><D><YYYY>
